content: say my account id and current model

and what do you do for me

I’m your personal AI assistant. My main role is to help you with coding, research, workspace tasks (like managing files or running commands), and to remember important details across sessions. I aim to make your work as a Software Dev smoother, answer questions, give practical advice, and keep things organized—all in a friendly, neutral tone. If you need something done, just ask!
give me a recap of last nights nba games

I don’t have live access to the internet or current sports data in this environment, so I can’t provide the latest NBA game recaps directly. However, if you’d like, I can show you how to quickly find last night’s NBA scores and summaries from reliable sources or pull live game data if web access is enabled. Just let me know how you’d like to proceed!
give me a recap of last nights nba games

Here’s a summary of last night’s NBA games based on the latest available web data:

- You can check live and finalized NBA scores and recaps on NBA.com’s Scoreboard: [NBA.com Scores](https://www.nba.com/)
- ESPN also provides detailed box scores, highlights, and play breakdowns for every game: [ESPN NBA Scoreboard](https://www.espn.com/nba/scoreboard)
- For a spoiler-free summary and which games are worth watching, WikiHoops is a great resource: [WikiHoops Recaps](https://wikihoops.com/)

If you tell me which team or matchup you’re interested in, I can give you a more detailed recap for specific games!
Tell me who won the all star game last night for nba

The USA Stars team won the 2026 NBA All-Star Game last night. They defeated the USA Stripes in the championship game, with a standout performance by Anthony Edwards, who was named the All-Star MVP. The final game score was 47-21 in favor of the USA Stars, and Edwards scored a total of 32 points across three games to help secure the victory.  
(Source: [NBA.com](https://www.nba.com/news/anthony-edwards-earns-2026-nba-all-star-kobe-bryant-mvp-award), [ESPN](https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/47900664/nba-all-star-weekend-2026-live-updates-results-highlights))
